## Height.(constructor)

Constructs a new instance of the `Height` class

**Signature:**

```typescript
constructor(config: HeightConfig);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  config | [HeightConfig](./height-app-api.heightconfig.md) | Configuration for Height API Wrapper |
